extendedInfo.description: Help Daisy find a fabulous new look by selecting her outfits, then take to the catwalk in front of the cameras to show off your designs. Choose outfits from a wardrobe full of dresses, tops, trousers and accessories â¦ and of course â every girlâs favourite â a large collection of shoes. Keep everything a secret in your very own secret diary or share with your friends!

reviews.title: Okay this is not on
reviews.comment: This dumb app looked AWESOME on the advert but then I installed it (or tried to ) and it said it couldn\'t download. I need help and if anyone has advice id like to hear it.
reviews.author: Jess ROX

reviews.title: Awsome

reviews.author: paul beilby

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: I loved this game! I think some people didn\'t like it because they were the wrong age or they didn\'t have the code that come with the shoes (which make it easier to get on to the game). Three of the things I love are the variation of clothes and the colours you can change them to, the \'design your own skirts\' and that at the start of the game (if you have the shoes), you put the daisy toy on the screen, and the toy gets \'digitalised\'! By Ruby, age nine years :-)
reviews.author: Sam Gamblin

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I have the daisy shoes every kind of them so I get all different codes so I can unlock all shoes ONLY DOWNLOAD IF YOU SHOES otherwise get it it\'s awesome By Cleopatra

reviews.title: It is an outrage!

reviews.title: Love it

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: The app is rubbish as it is but the fact you have to buy the shoes to get the code is terrible but clever cause thry want the kids mums and dads to get the app do their wee girls will get excited when they actually go on the app you need a code or unlock by skill yeah you do that but it only lasts for a session which means the wee girls get upset and then they want the shoes for the stupid code in my opinion this app is a waste of time even to download

reviews.title: Marketing failure...
reviews.comment: Skill game is only possible if you pick the correct cards EVERY time. Unlocking content is not possible without a code: maybe a complaint to the ASA...
